SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface LeaveInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
LeaveUI
public interface LeaveInterface
The LeaveInterface defines methods for managing leave requests within the system. It provides functionality for doctors to apply for leave, view the status of their leave requests, and for administrators or managers to manage and update leave requests.

This interface can be implemented by classes responsible for handling leave-related operations in the system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
    Allows a doctor to apply for leave.
    void
    displayAllLeaveRequests()
    Displays all leave requests in the system.
    void

    Displays the outcome of leave requests for a specific doctor, rejected or approved.

    Displays pending leave requests for a specific doctor.

    Manages all leave requests in the system.
    void

    removes leave request for a specific doctor.
    void

    Updates the leave status for a specific doctor.

  • Method Details

    • applyLeave

      void applyLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Allows a doctor to apply for leave.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor applying for leave.

    • displayAllLeaveRequests

      void displayAllLeaveRequests()
      Displays all leave requests in the system.

      This method is intended for administrators or managers to view all leave requests, regardless of their status.

    • displayPendingLeave

      void displayPendingLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Displays pending leave requests for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor whose pending leave requests are to be displayed.

    • displayLeaveOutcome

      void displayLeaveOutcome(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Displays the outcome of leave requests for a specific doctor, rejected or approved.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor whose leave outcomes are to be displayed.

    • manageLeaveRequests

      void manageLeaveRequests(Scanner sc)
      Manages all leave requests in the system.

      This method is intended for administrators or managers to approve, reject, or modify leave requests.

      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

    • updateLeave

      void updateLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Updates the leave status for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor whose leave status is to be updated.

    • removeLeave

      void removeLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      removes leave request for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor whose leave request is to be removed.
